laboratory_examinations.findings: Normalization of blood ammonia after adding arginine and benzoate to diet.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normal levels achieved after creatine supplementation (range, 28.0–56.0 /H9262mol/L).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Marked reduction of b wave amplitude, especially of the rod response (26 /H9262V in both eyes, normal /H11022300 /H9262V); less severe reduction of combined rod-cone (RE: 125 /H9262V; LE: 159 /H9262V, normal /H11022380 /H9262V) and cone (RE: 47.5 /H9262V; LE: 39.5 /H9262V, normal /H1102290/H9262V) responses.
Peripheral constriction at the borders of the central 30° (RE: MD /H11005–7.80 dB; PSD /H110055.20 dB; LE: MD /H11005–5.97 dB; PSD /H110053.49 dB).

laboratory_examinations.date: One year after the first evaluation
laboratory_examinations.findings: Worsening and enlargement of atrophic areas.
